email_content:
Hi Lisa,

I hope you’re doing well.

I’m reaching out to ask whether MarketHub is currently offering any promotional pricing or discounts that I might take advantage of. I’m exploring options for our upcoming projects and would appreciate any details you can share—such as available offers, eligibility requirements, or timing.

Thank you for your time, and I look forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
